# invitationsDisabled

**Type Property**

The system can’t complete the requested operation because the receiving player has disabled invitations.

## Declaration

```swift
static var invitationsDisabled: GKError.Code { get }
```

## Error Codes

- **GKError.Code**: Error codes for the GameKit error domain.
- **authenticationInProgress**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the local player is already authenticating.
- **cancelled**: The system canceled the requested operation or the user disabled it.
- **challengeInvalid**: The challenge request failed due to invalid challenge data.
- **communicationsFailure**: The system can’t complete the requested operation due to an error communicating with the server.
- **gameSessionRequestInvalid**: The properties of the game session request are impossible to fulfill.
- **gameUnrecognized**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because Game Center doesn’t recognize the app.
- **invalidCredentials**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the user name or password are incorrect.
- **invalidParameter**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because one or more parameters are invalid.
- **invalidPlayer**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the player is invalid.
- **matchNotConnected**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the match isn’t connected to other players.
- **matchRequestInvalid**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the match request is invalid.
- **notAuthenticated**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the system hasn’t initialized the local player.
- **notSupported**: The app doesn’t have Game Center enabled.
- **parentalControlsBlocked**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the user disabled this feature in Restrictions.
